pages.text: $(thing)AutoTerraFirmaCraft$() is a modpack focused on integrating Create into TFC in such a way that the two mods' progression systems naturally complement each other without sacrificing the realistic, low-tech feel of base TFC.$(br2)In service of this certain elements of Create have been changed; $(thing)Blaze Burners$() for instance have been reworked$(br)   into $(l:patchouli:create_integration/coal_forges)Coal Forges$().

This modpack has been designed with the aim of requiring both mods' structures to automate successfully.$(br2)For this reason while Heated Basin Recipes are available, metals can only be melted down in a $(thing)Forge$() or $(thing)Crucible$().$(br2)Those liquids could then be automatically piped into Basins and cast, or filled into molds by a Spout.$(br2)All TFC structures can be automated in this pack.

$(br)Many crafting recipes have been changed in order to guide the gameplay progression of the player.$(br)This is accomplished through the use of $(thing)over 1000 JSON files!$()$(br2)A few Create blocks are available in the Copper Age.$(br2)Most are available from the Iron Age onwards.$(br2)The most advanced however will$(br)   require Steel.
$(thing)Windmill Bearings$() are a good example of the integration of the two mods, requiring both TFC and Create processes to build.

$(br)While the recipe for $(thing)Water Wheels$() has not changed, the scarcity of buckets necessitates the use of $(l:mechanics/aqueducts)Aqueducts$().$(br2)As a result early game machinery must be built near water.
